operations.notes: Get the list of Containers configured in the cluster.
Add a Container to the cluster.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on any Container.
Get the list of NFS Datastores.
operations.notes: Get the list of NFS Datastores mounted using Containers in the cluster.

operations.summary: Get the list of events generated on any Container.

operations.notes: Delete a Container with the specified id from the cluster.
Get a Container with the specified id.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on a specified Container.
Get the list of events generated on a specified Container.
Get the stats for a specified Container.
operations.notes: If start time and end time are included in the query string, then historical stats are retrieved. Otherwise, the latest stats are retrieved.
Get the list of VDisks of the specified Container.

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chartQueries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

hasGlobalDetails.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

numResolvedCount.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parentCauseId.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshootingSteps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metricDetails.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metricDetails.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severityTrails.description: List that contains severity level change details
severityTrails.notes: List that contains severity level change details

comparisonOperator.description: Comparison Operator to be applied for teh values.

conditionType.description: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.
conditionType.notes: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.

metricValueDetails.description: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle
metricValueDetails.notes: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle

metricThresholdValue.description: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.
metricThresholdValue.notes: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.

metricValue.description: Actual value of the metric at that given time.
metricValue.notes: Actual value of the metric at that given time.

stateChangeTimeStampInUsecs.description: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.
stateChangeTimeStampInUsecs.notes: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severityChangeTimestampInUsecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severityChangeTimestampInUsecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred
